title: Adventure playgrounds
creator_contributor_role: National Playing Fields Association, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Child development
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Children - Recreation
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Juvenile delinquency - Prevention

Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Children - Recreation
description: An adventure playground can be created by children themselves, out of scrap materials on a piece of wasteland. It can provide an outlet for energy, a means for building self-confidence, and reducing the juvenile delinquency rate. Discusses the importance of the play leader.
